data.name: They Always Run Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The official soundtrack from They Always Run, an Action-Platformer made by Alawar Premium. Featuring original music composed by Deallry, this album contains all 25 tracks recorded for the game in WAV format + 2 tracks composed by A. Lednik.
data.about_the_game: The official soundtrack from They Always Run, an Action-Platformer made by Alawar Premium. Featuring original music composed by Deallry, this album contains all 25 tracks recorded for the game in WAV format + 2 tracks composed by A. Lednik.
data.short_description: 26 Original soundtracks from the Action-Platformer They Always Run.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space
